price: [And they will be told,] “Indeed, this is your reward, and your efforts have been appreciated.”
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَكَانَ سَعۡيُكُم مَّشۡكُورًا
